name: drizzle-orm-d1
description: Type-safe ORM for Cloudflare D1 databases using Drizzle. This skill provides comprehensive patterns for schema definition, migrations management, type-safe queries, relations, and Cloudflare Workers integration. Use when: building D1 database schemas, writing type-safe SQL queries, managing database migrations with Drizzle Kit, defining table relations, implementing prepared statements, using D1 batch API for transactions, or encountering D1_ERROR, transaction errors, foreign key constraint fail
